text: Ticketing counter building The Taming Sari Tower (Malay: Menara Taming Sari) is a revolving gyro tower in Malacca City, Malacca, Malaysia. ==History== The tower was opened to the public on 18 April 2008 and officiated by Malacca Chief Minister Mohd Ali Rustam on 17 May 2008. ==Technical details== The height of the tower is 110 meters. The capacity of the carriage is 80 passengers and the ride lasts for 7 minutes. ==See also== * Gyro tower ==References== ==External links== * Malacca Tourist Attraction Category:2008 establishments in Malaysia Category:Buildings and structures in Malacca Category:Tourist attractions in Malacca Category:Towers completed in 2008 Category:Towers in Malaysia
title: Taming Sari Tower
